summary: A command‑line utility that reads an audio manifest, extracts acoustic features (e.g., pitch, energy) according to a configurable YAML file, and writes the resulting feature tensors to a target directory, optionally overwriting existing data and leveraging parallel workers.
business_intent: Automate the preprocessing of speech corpora for text‑to‑speech model training, ensuring consistent feature generation to accelerate model development and improve training quality.
